content:
Evidences (Documents/ Microsoft Teams remote interview/Physical site visit) referred for verification of individual monitoring parameter and fixed parameters are defined under section 4.4. We further confirm that, sufficient evidence covering the entire monitoring period and at the required frequency were available. A list of referred documents for verification is also included in Appendix 1 of this report. Verification team conclude that evidences used to determine the GHG reductions and removals are completely available for the monitoring period (sufficiency of quantity) and are appropriate in quality.

29

Vv vcs

Verification Report: VCS Version 4.2
